item.title: AKoM - All Kinds of Materials (2015) by Patrick Housen
item.description:
AKoM - All Kinds of Materials (2015) by Patrick Housen

Mixed Ensemble that clashes high & low brow. Classical instruments vs drums and electronic bass

item.title: Does it ever rain in the rainforest by Patrick Housen
item.description:
Does it ever rain in the rainforest by Patrick Housen

Soundscape created by using a PD patch with different Delays and filters. All signalprocessing is done in real time. Played by Ellen Nuttin (e-Violin) en Patrick Housen (E-Guitar)

item.title: Saxophrenia by Patrick Housen
item.description:
Saxophrenia by Patrick Housen

Saxophrenia live op Saxotic! 25/03/2012

item.title: Cliffhanger by Patrick Housen
item.description:
Cliffhanger by Patrick Housen

A composition of mine, played by Clarinet 4 Ebano. This is a live performance of a concert in the conservatory Ghent on 24th of April 2012

item.title: Colliding Universes by Patrick Housen
item.description:
Colliding Universes by Patrick Housen

Work from 2011. This is a live recording from a concert at the Conservatory of Ghent. It is based round the concept of parallel universes.

item.title: Wat als de Aarde naar adems snakte by Patrick Housen
item.description:
Wat als de Aarde naar adems snakte by Patrick Housen

Live performed soundscape by Henk Debruycker and me Alt viool - elektrische gitaar - Pre-recorded sounds - live electronics

item.title: MAD HOUSE by Patrick Housen
item.description:
MAD HOUSE by Patrick Housen

Het huis dat tot leven komt! (letterlijk) Hierbij ben ik vertrokken van zelf opgenomen geluiden in drie huizen. Deze heb ik bewerkt en helemaal uitgewerkt in deze creatie. Eindopdracht Klankrealisatie

item.title: Down the Upbow by Patrick Housen
item.description:
Down the Upbow by Patrick Housen

Experimentele Soundscape gemaakt met opgenomen stemmen, geluiden, gestreken en 'plucked' Gitaar. Alles is opgenomen met een Plinky Microfoon. Thema hierachter is de 'demonen uitdrijving uit een gitaar' ;-)

item.title: Tripped (live) by Patrick Housen
item.description:
Tripped (live) by Patrick Housen

New piece for Solo flute and pre-recorded loops. This is a live performance of the piece at a Concert at the Miry Hall in Gent on 11 December 2012 Concept: For me "Tripped" has two meanings. -Literal; you can trip and fall -Having a "bad tripp", i.e.

item.title: Maze by Patrick Housen
item.description:
Maze by Patrick Housen

Live recording of Maze Maze (2012) is a piece I've written for - the celebration of An Pierl√© as composer of the city of Ghent 2013. It had it's debut performance by Headliner @ 'Week van de Hedendaagse Muziek' in Ghent on 27/03/13 Link to facebook page of Headliner: http://tinyurl.com/cekm2uj - Go check these guys out!
